headline: CRM's AI and Data Cloud ARR Surges 120%: Can the Momentum Continue?
summary: Salesforce's AI and Data Cloud ARR jumps to $1.2B in Q2, with surging customer adoption fueling its next growth phase.

headline: Blue Mantis Acquires Coreio Inc., Expanding ServiceNow Capabilities, Nearshore Delivery and Canadian Market Reach
summary: PORTSMOUTH, N.H., Sept. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Blue Mantis, a security-first IT services provider specializing in helping clients achieve business modernization by applying next-generation technologies, today announced the acquisition of Coreio Inc., a fast-growing IT services firm specializing in ServiceNow consulting, infrastructure and operations (I&O) and managed services. This strategic move positions Blue Mantis to accelerate its growth in the rapidly expanding ServiceNow midmarket s

headline: Is ServiceNow’s Latest AI-Driven Expansion Enough to Justify Its Current Share Price?
summary: If you are on the fence about what to do with your ServiceNow shares, you are not alone. This is one of those tech stocks that seems constantly in motion, keeping investors guessing as markets shift and the appetite for growth companies evolves. Over the past month, ServiceNow has gained 6.9%, bouncing back from declines earlier this year. While it is still down about 10.1% year-to-date, its impressive 156.1% return over the last three years is tough to ignore. This kind of long-term momentum...
